title: Leah Remini and Angelo Pagan to Divorce After 21 Years of Marriage
text:
Leah Remini, renowned for her roles in Kevin Can Wait , King of Queens , and Saved By the Bell , has announced that she and her husband, Angelo Pagan, will be divorcing after 21 years of marriage. Their relationship spans 28 years, making this change significant for both parties.
Leah Remini and Angelo Pagan have declared their intention to divorce. File Photo by Jim Ruymen/UPI On Instagram, the couple shared their decision with the world. ‘We have decided to file for divorce,’ they wrote, indicating a mutual understanding of the situation.
The couple at the Primetime Emmy Awards in Los Angeles in 2006. File Photo by Jim Ruymen/UPI In their heartfelt message, they expressed, ‘This decision came after a lot of thought and care.’ They acknowledged the difficulty of divorce but emphasized their positive outlook. ‘We know it’s what’s best for us,’ they stated. Their commitment to handling the situation amicably is evident in their words.
The couple also reflected on their shared journey, admitting, ‘We are proud of how we have worked through this together.’ They conveyed their sadness about the split but reassured their followers that they would continue to support each other. ‘We’ve got some figuring out to do as we continue to move forward into our new normal—together still in many ways, and apart in some new ones,’ they added.
Leah Remini at the world premiere of Second Act in New York City in 2018. File Photo by John Angelillo/UPI Together, Leah Remini and Angelo Pagan share a daughter named Sofia, who is 20 years old. Pagán also has three sons—Angelo Jr., Alex, and Nico—from a previous relationship, further expanding their family dynamics.
Leah Remini at the Creative Arts Emmy Awards in 2018. File Photo by Gregg DeGuire/UPI Leah Remini at the “Funny Ladies We Love” awards presented by Ladies’ Home Journal in 2006 in Los Angeles. File Photo by Michael Tweed/UPI The public is often drawn to celebrity relationships, especially those that span decades. Remini and Pagan’s commitment to approach this transition positively is encouraging amid the challenges that come with such a significant life change. Like many couples, they have faced ups and downs, but their dedication to maintaining a supportive relationship for their daughter and blended family remains commendable.
As they embark on their new journey separately, fans and well-wishers alike are hopeful for happiness and fulfillment for both Leah Remini and Angelo Pagan in the next chapters of their lives.
Source: UPI
